title: YARD / CUNO WHO IS CUNO
description:
* Who is Cuno?
* Make amends with Cuno.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's Cuno!" The boy points to hi..."
dialogueTree.text: "Cuno's Cuno!" The boy points to his chest with both thumbs. "You already know that, slow-shit."

links.title: You: ""Right. How could I forget?""
links.text: "Right. How could I forget?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno thinks you have brain damage..."
links.text: "Cuno thinks you have brain damage or some shit." He twirls a finger next to his head. "Cuno cares."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Cuno, stop being nice to the pig!"..."
links.text: "Cuno, stop being nice to the pig!" The screech pierces through the yard. "Step away from Cuno, fat-ass creep!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Ease off, C. Don't be telling Cuno..."
links.text: "Ease off, C. Don't be telling Cuno what Cuno can do!" He turns back to you. "What else you want, pigman?"

links.title: Authority: "It's safe to say he *did not* estab..."
links.text: It's safe to say he *did not* establish dominance over you.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows to respect that violent..."
links.text: "Cuno knows to respect that violent shit. You should see Cuno's dad -- Cuno's dad doesn't give a shit about *anything*," he declares with pride.

links.title: Cunoesse: "The creature behind the fence has f..."
links.text: The creature behind the fence has fallen ominously silent. Only her eyes are alive, jumping from actor to actor.

links.title: Empathy: "She understands: The battle for the..."
links.text: She understands: The battle for the control over Cuno is a battle of madness against madness. For the time being, her madness has proven less potent.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Interesting. This tug of war has pr..."
links.text: Interesting. This tug of war has probably happened between her and Cuno's violent father too.

links.title: Cuno: ""Okay, pig. Talk to Cuno. We're bac..."
links.text: "Okay, pig. Talk to Cuno. We're back in this shit." He brushes the dirt off his pants. "The fuck do you want?"

links.title: Authority: "If this act was about him trying to..."
links.text: If this act was about him trying to establish dominance over you, it's safe to say things didn't go as he'd planned.

links.title: You: ""Got it -- had another question.""
links.text: "Got it -- had another question."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Escalate, Cuno! His dick is out, y..."
links.text: "Escalate, Cuno! His dick is out, you're afraid!"

links.title: Cuno: ""PIGS ARE HURTING CUNO! SOMEBODY *P..."
links.text: "PIGS ARE HURTING CUNO! SOMEBODY *PLEASE!!!*" It's full blast now; the wind carries the message far and wide across Martinaise.

links.title: Shivers: "Windows are being opened. On Rue Sa..."
links.text: Windows are being opened. On Rue Saint-Cispare, people are turning their heads. An elderly woman puts down her grocery bags in front of the Frittte store and listens. Somewhere behind her, the gates of the industrial harbour are raised.

links.title: Shivers: "On the catwalk above the shipping c..."
links.text: On the catwalk above the shipping containers, a broad-shouldered man jerks his head up. "That Cuno? Cop's getting killed out there." The tattooed Mesque next to him smiles. "That's Cuno alright!"

links.title: Half Light: "Look at his shit-eating grin... He..."
links.text: Look at his shit-eating grin... He knows there's nothing you can do to him. He's bullying you and you are helpless. Kill him. Kill him now. He won't see death coming.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Nip it in the bud, before it gets c..."
links.text: Nip it in the bud, before it gets completely out of hand. Right on his cheek. Just a light tap... to scare him a little. Don't kill him.

links.title: Logic: "Scare him? How did this happen? You..."
links.text: Scare him? How did this happen? You can still get out of this, appeal to his reason!

links.title: You: ""Be logical, kid. I haven't done an..."
links.text: "Be logical, kid. I haven't done anything to you."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fucking logical?" He snorts. "HELP..."
links.text: "Fucking logical?" He snorts. "HELP! The logical pig is fiddling Cuno!"

links.title: You: ""What is this sick charade?""
links.text: "What is this sick charade?"

links.title: Cuno: ""NOOOO!!!" the boy screams, his fre..."
links.text: "NOOOO!!!" the boy screams, his freckled face contorted in hideous, uncontainable laughter. "Get off Cuno, you sick fat fuck!"

links.title: Drama: "The nearly psychopathic way they ca..."
links.text: The nearly psychopathic way they can slip in and out of the act implies you're not the first victim.

links.title: You: ""Who put you up to this?""
links.text: "Who put you up to this?"

links.title: Cuno: ""No one," he whispers suddenly. "Cu..."
links.text: "No one," he whispers suddenly. "Cuno's doing this because he *likes* it, pig."

links.title: Authority: "This is where Cuno establishes domi..."
links.text: This is where Cuno establishes dominance. Over you.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Change of plan, you can't let that..."
links.text: Change of plan, you can't let that happen! It will make things harder down the line, you may end up missing crucial information.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You can't let that happen. It will..."
links.text: You can't let that happen. It will make things harder down the line, you may end up missing crucial information.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""HELP! The pig's gagging him. Cuno..."
links.text: "HELP! The pig's gagging him. Cuno can't speak!"

links.title: You: ""Someone put you up to this.""
links.text: "Someone put you up to this."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You put him up to this yourself --..."
links.text: "You put him up to this yourself -- when you decided to talk to him in the first place."

links.title: Cuno: ""Listen to your f****t friend." Cun..."
links.text: "Listen to your f****t friend." Cuno hawks a loogie on the ground. The phlegm is yellowish and bubbling somehow.

links.title: You: ""Did Garte put you up to this?""
links.text: "Did Garte put you up to this?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno owns the fatass," he whispers..."
links.text: "Cuno owns the fatass," he whispers, then looks around and yells from the top of his lungs: "Help, the RCM is trying to *FUCK* Cuno!"

links.title: Volition: "Here's an idea... *Don't* think abo..."
links.text: Here's an idea... *Don't* think about shutting this twelve year old down. Stop asking him questions. Just walk away and cool off.

links.title: You: ""Kim, did *you* do this?""
links.text: "Kim, did *you* do this?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Yeah, we're all in this together!"..."
links.text: "Yeah, we're all in this together!" The little one hisses with glee. "The *banaanipoika* is losing it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't even shrug."
links.text: The lieutenant doesn't even shrug.

links.title: Cuno: ""HELP!" Tears of laughter are runni..."
links.text: "HELP!" Tears of laughter are running down his flushed face. "The RCM is trying to fuck us!"

links.title: You: ""It was the harbour, wasn't it? The..."
links.text: "It was the harbour, wasn't it? They're trying to compromise me. I can hear them laughing now..."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You're fucking losing it, you fat..."
links.text: "You're fucking losing it, you fat fuck!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Help, people!" His face is contort..."
links.text: "Help, people!" His face is contorted with hideous laughter. "The RCM is trying to fuck Cuno in the ass!"

links.title: You: ""Okay, no one put you up to this.""
links.text: "Okay, no one put you up to this."

links.title: Cuno: ""Help, the RCM is trying to fuck Cu..."
links.text: "Help, the RCM is trying to fuck Cuno in the ass!" Tears of joy mix with sweat smelling of laundry detergent on his face.

links.title: Cuno: ""You did this to yourself, when you..."
links.text: "You did this to yourself, when you antagonized the Cuno." He looks around, then yells: "POLICE VIOLENCE! RAPE!!!"

links.title: You: ""Are you high right now?""
links.text: "Are you high right now?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Help, misters! HELP!" He prances a..."
links.text: "Help, misters! HELP!" He prances around, eyes bulging out of their sockets, rolling hard, yelling at the windows...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Rolling *super* hard."
links.text: Rolling *super* hard.

links.title: Empathy: "He's having the time of his life. T..."
links.text: He's having the time of his life. Total ecstasy. Fuck the pig.

links.title: Cuno: ""He's flashing Cuno, he's showing h..."
links.text: "He's flashing Cuno, he's showing his genitals! If you don't help Cuno now it will be too late!"

links.title: You: "Shut him down."
links.text: Shut him down.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Thump! The blow connects surprising..."
links.text: Thump! The blow connects surprisingly well, leaving your knuckles tingling.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Cuno *feels* it; this was no light..."
links.text: Cuno *feels* it; this was no light tap.

links.title: Cuno: ""Phe... whht... fuuh..." The disori..."
links.text: "Phe... whht... fuuh..." The disoriented twelve year old is trying to get his bearings.

links.title: You: ""Okay! Everybody calm down.""
links.text: "Okay! Everybody calm down."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, *you* need to calm down,"..."
links.text: "Officer, *you* need to calm down," says the lieutenant, breaking his silence. "Get a hold of yourself."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "For heaven's sake, he thinks, this..."
links.text: For heaven's sake, he thinks, this has gone too far. Don't make this any worse than it is -- just get back to questioning the kid.

links.title: Suggestion: "He gets it, you lost it. Just don't..."
links.text: He gets it, you lost it. Just don't dig the hole any deeper.

links.title: Cuno: ""Okay, pig..." He's no longer weari..."
links.text: "Okay, pig..." He's no longer wearing his demonic grin. Something happened. The punch made him calmer.

links.title: Drama: "You can almost hear the gears rattl..."
links.text: You can almost hear the gears rattling -- a change in set decorations.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""*Taivaan tähden*, you killed Cuno!""
links.text: "*Taivaan tähden*, you killed Cuno!"

links.title: You: ""Shit... I don't know what got into..."
links.text: "Shit... I don't know what got into me..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You lost control," says the lieute..."
links.text: "You lost control," says the lieutenant, breaking his silence. "You need to get yourself together."

links.title: You: ""*You* made me do this. You did thi..."
links.text: "*You* made me do this. You did this to yourself."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, officer -- you did this," says..."
links.text: "No, officer -- you did this," says the lieutenant, breaking his silence. "Get yourself together."

links.title: You: ""I think we can have a normal conve..."
links.text: "I think we can have a normal conversation now. Am I right, Cuno?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, this is very far from nor..."
links.text: "Officer, this is very far from normal police conduct," says the lieutenant, breaking his silence. "Get yourself together."

links.title: You: ""Who's doing a *sick charade* now?""
links.text: "Who's doing a *sick charade* now?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You are, officer," says the lieute..."
links.text: "You are, officer," says the lieutenant, breaking his silence. "Get yourself together."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "For heaven's sake, he thinks, this..."
links.text: For heaven's sake, he thinks, this has gone too far. Don't make it worse -- just get back to questioning the kid.

links.title: Suggestion: "The lieutenant doesn't appreciate y..."
links.text: The lieutenant doesn't appreciate your *sick charades* on his crime scene. His opinion of you has lessened.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You didn't shut him down. Your fat..."
links.text: You didn't shut him down. Your fat fist didn't meet its target. Instead, it pulled you down with it.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "It's not as bad as it feels. You've..."
links.text: It's not as bad as it feels. You've maybe pulled a joint; the indignity makes it worse.

links.title: You: ""Ouch, my arm... and my fucking *kn..."
links.text: "Ouch, my arm... and my fucking *knee*..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno can't believe this shit!" It'..."
links.text: "Cuno can't believe this shit!" It's like he's now realized he has super-powers. "Can *no one* stop the Cuno?!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Pig, Cuno thought you had this. Wh..."
links.text: "Pig, Cuno thought you had this. What happened? Cuno can do *anything* now." He's writhing with joy, like the power you gave him is too much to take.

links.title: Authority: "It's safe to say he has established..."
links.text: It's safe to say he has established dominance over you.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Fucked your shoulder, fucked your..."
links.text: "Fucked your shoulder, fucked your knee, fucked your fat body up!" the one behind the fence hisses like a lit fuse ready to go off from delight.

links.title: You: ""Kim, help me up!""
links.text: "Kim, help me up!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: You: ""Stop laughing!""
links.text: "Stop laughing!"

links.title: Cunoesse: "The creature behind the fence makes..."
links.text: The creature behind the fence makes it a point to laugh even harder.

links.title: Drama: "It's a dry laugh. Mirthless. She's..."
links.text: It's a dry laugh. Mirthless. She's not even actually enjoying this. She only wants to hurt you.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno made you his fuck-gimp!" He b..."
links.text: "Cuno made you his fuck-gimp!" He bursts into a violent fit of laughter. Sounds like a flock of seagulls taking flight.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant isn't laughing. At a..."
links.text: The lieutenant isn't laughing. At all.

links.title: Composure: "Get a hold of yourself. At least th..."
links.text: Get a hold of yourself. At least the previous horror is over. At least they're no longer...

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I deserved this.""
links.text: "Yeah, I deserved this."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, you deserve this. Trying to..."
links.text: "Yeah, you deserve this. Trying to show your dick to Cuno. Cuno was scared."

links.title: Drama: "Oh god, do something quick, they're..."
links.text: Oh god, do something quick, they're gonna start *that* again!

links.title: You: ""Someone call an ambulance, I think..."
links.text: "Someone call an ambulance, I think I really hurt myself!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, you need to get up. This..."
links.text: "Officer, you need to get up. This is turning into a farce."

links.title: Cuno: ""That's what you get if you fuck wi..."
links.text: "That's what you get if you fuck with the Cuno. You get fucked up."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, laugh it up. Let's just get..."
links.text: "Yeah, laugh it up. Let's just get back to it." (Get up.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno beat the shit out of popo!" T..."
links.text: "Cuno beat the shit out of popo!" The kid is laughing so hard, tears are running down his freckled cheeks. "Beat your fucking knee off."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I told you not to tempt such force..."
links.text: "I told you not to tempt such forces." The annoyance in his voice is directed at you, not the gremlins.

links.title: Suggestion: "He gets it. You lost. Now walk away..."
links.text: He gets it. You lost. Now walk away with what remains of your dignity.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now how about we go and do somethi..."
links.text: "Now how about we go and do something worth the public's time?"

links.title: Cunoesse: "Cunoesse is staring at Cuno with pr..."
links.text: Cunoesse is staring at Cuno with pride-filled eyes, almost forgetting your presence.

links.title: Composure: "Everything about her is saying *Wow..."
links.text: Everything about her is saying *Wow -- what a man*. Her admiration is fuelled by camaraderie.

links.title: Volition: "You lost. Now walk away with what r..."
links.text: You lost. Now walk away with what remains of your dignity.

links.title: You: ""Do you have any idea of the shit y..."
links.text: "Do you have any idea of the shit you just got yourself into, kid?" (Get up.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's just gonna beat the shit ou..."
links.text: "Cuno's just gonna beat the shit out of you again." He is clearly still in awe of himself right now.

links.title: Authority: "The whole charade was about establi..."
links.text: The whole charade was about establishing dominance over you. It's safe to say he has succeeded.

links.title: You: "Say nothing, try to hold it togethe..."
links.text: Say nothing, try to hold it together.

links.title: Cuno: ""Pig's tryin' not to cry. Cuno can'..."
links.text: "Pig's tryin' not to cry. Cuno can't believe this shit!" It's like he's now realized he has super-powers. "Can *no one* stop the Cuno?!"

links.title: You: "Try really, *really* hard to hold i..."
links.text: Try really, *really* hard to hold it together.

links.title: Cuno: ""Pig's biting down on his knuckles...."
links.text: "Pig's biting down on his knuckles. Cuno can't believe this shit!" It's like he's now realized he has super-powers. "Can *no one* stop the Cuno?!"

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Stay with me, the biting is having..."
links.text: Stay with me, the biting is having *some* kind of effect, the pain is receding...

links.title: You: "Don't punch him -- it's a bad idea...."
links.text: Don't punch him -- it's a bad idea. (Back off.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Look, f*g..." Cuno whispers, even..."
links.text: "Look, f*g..." Cuno whispers, even softer than before, vanishingly silent...

links.title: Drama: "For emphasis. A *ghost* is saying t..."
links.text: For emphasis. A *ghost* is saying this. A shit-eating psychopathic ghost with an ace up his sleeve.

links.title: Cuno: ""I know you wanted to hit me..." He..."
links.text: "I know you wanted to hit me..." He lets it linger. "You got that 'I'm gonna fuck that Cuno up' look that Cuno's dad gets. The murder look... the rage look..."

links.title: Logic: "Relax, he can't read your mind. He..."
links.text: Relax, he can't read your mind. He doesn't know you were thinking that.

links.title: Composure: "There's a dead body, remember? That..."
links.text: There's a dead body, remember? That's what you were doing here. You're a cop on a case.

links.title: You: ""No!""
links.text: "No!"

links.title: Cuno: ""I know what you thought: 'I'm gonn..."
links.text: "I know what you thought: 'I'm gonna fuck that Cuno up, I'm gonna shut that shit down...' You know what? You should've, because now..." He raises he's voice again.

links.title: You: ""Yes, but I didn't act on it. It wa..."
links.text: "Yes, but I didn't act on it. It was just a fantasy."

links.title: You: ""Yes, how do I get back to it? I wa..."
links.text: "Yes, how do I get back to it? I wanna go back to that thought!"

links.title: Cuno: ""It's good you said that -- here it..."
links.text: "It's good you said that -- here it is! Here we go... Cuno likes this..." He starts prancing around again, tongue lolling out of his mouth...

links.title: You: ""Yes. No. I've changed my mind agai..."
links.text: "Yes. No. I've changed my mind again."

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh no, you pussied out again. Shou..."
links.text: "Oh no, you pussied out again. Shouldn't have done that, Cuno's gonna bitch you out now. Cuno's gonna *sub let* you..." He raises his voice again.

links.title: Cuno: ""Pass you around like Candy, fat bo..."
links.text: "Pass you around like Candy, fat boy! Pass your fat ass AROUND!" He spreads his arms, taking dominion over the yard. "KING CUNO!"

links.title: You: ""Why don't we get back to the inter..."
links.text: "Why don't we get back to the interview, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""Look, f*g..." Cuno whispers as you..."
links.text: "Look, f*g..." Cuno whispers as you retreat, vanishingly silent...

links.title: You: "Just walk away. [Leave.]"
links.text: Just walk away. [Leave.]

links.title: Logic: "How did we get here? How did this h..."
links.text: How did we get here? How did this happen? This makes no sense... There may still be a way out, just appeal to his *reason*!

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Nip it in the bud, before it gets c..."
links.text: Nip it in the bud, before it gets completely out of hand. Right on his cheek. Just a light tap... to scare him a little. It won't kill him.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's Cuno, pig!" The boy points..."
dialogueTree.text: "Cuno's Cuno, pig!" The boy points to his chest with both thumbs.

links.title: Logic: "It's always *Cuno*, never *I*. Clea..."
links.text: It's always *Cuno*, never *I*. Clearly the kid's using the third-person perspective as a shield.

links.title: Half Light: "Cuno... Primal. Violent."
links.text: Cuno... Primal. Violent.

links.title: You: ""Cuno? Sounds like something you'd..."
links.text: "Cuno? Sounds like something you'd call a rabid dog..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah!" His eyes light up. "Think a..."
links.text: "Yeah!" His eyes light up. "Think about it. Think about that rabid Cuno shit."

links.title: Empathy: "He seems glad someone understood wh..."
links.text: He seems glad someone understood what he was going for -- but right as he's getting distracted, you hear a malevolent hiss from behind the fence...

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Watch out, Cuno, he's trying to fi..."
links.text: "Watch out, Cuno, he's trying to fiddle you. He's gonna put his HANDS on you!" The *thing* behind the fence starts squealing, shrill and violent like a fire alarm.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Help! Pigs got Cuno! Help! RAPE!"..."
links.text: "Help! Pigs got Cuno! Help! RAPE!" The sound gets louder as the child shouts at the windows overlooking the yard.

links.title: Cuno: ""Help!" The boy joins in. "He's got..."
links.text: "Help!" The boy joins in. "He's got the Cuno!!! HELP!!!"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Everyone can hear. You need to get..."
links.text: Everyone can hear. You need to get the hell out of here before...

links.title: Volition: "Calm down. Anyone watching can see..."
links.text: Calm down. Anyone watching can see you're doing nothing. Just keep it professional.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "FUCK THAT. Confront him."
links.text: FUCK THAT. Confront him.

links.title: You: ""I'm not doing anything! See?""
links.text: "I'm not doing anything! See?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Everybody! PLEASE!!! He's digging..."
links.text: "Everybody! PLEASE!!! He's digging his dick out!!!"

links.title: You: ""Just answer the questions.""
links.text: "Just answer the questions."

links.title: Cuno: ""Help! He's digging his dick out!!!""
links.text: "Help! He's digging his dick out!!!"

links.title: You: ""I'm just going to leave." (Conclud..."
links.text: "I'm just going to leave." (Conclude the conversation.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, get out of here before the C..."
links.text: "Yeah, get out of here before the Cuno beats *the shit* out of you."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Yeah, that's right... drag your fa..."
links.text: "Yeah, that's right... drag your fat ass out of here, fat boy. Before Cuno fucks you!"

links.title: Volition: "Don't listen. Just go."
links.text: Don't listen. Just go.

links.title: You: "Listen."
links.text: Listen.

links.title: You: "Just go. [Leave.]"
links.text: Just go. [Leave.]

links.title: Cuno: ""Baaang! Got fucked by the Cuno." Y..."
links.text: "Baaang! Got fucked by the Cuno." You hear him say as you walk away. "We alright. You wanna get fucked again, come back."

links.title: You: ""Interesting... you refer to yourse..."
links.text: "Interesting... you refer to yourself in the third person to distance yourself from the situation?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno doesn't do that *smart* shit...."
links.text: "Cuno doesn't do that *smart* shit." He seems offended. "Don't throw that book shit at Cuno. Cuno knows you're lying."

links.title: Cuno: ""Trying to get Cuno hooked on the b..."
links.text: "Trying to get Cuno hooked on the book..."

links.title: Empathy: "The boy knows he has an addictive p..."
links.text: The boy knows he has an addictive personality. Admirable insight for his age.

links.title: You: ""So you refer to yourself in the th..."
links.text: "So you refer to yourself in the third person?"

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck are you calling a *third..."
links.text: "The fuck are you calling a *third person*?! Cuno's the fucking FIRST person."

links.title: Empathy: "He looks slightly confused but prou..."
links.text: He looks slightly confused but proud he came up with that retort -- but right as he's getting distracted, you hear a malevolent hiss from behind the fence...

links.title: You: ""Cuno? Is that some kind of gang na..."
links.text: "Cuno? Is that some kind of gang name?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cuno's in a fucking gang. In..."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno's in a fucking gang. In a bang gang. Cuno bangs for Madre, bangs for the Mazda, bangs for Revachol..."

links.title: Empathy: "He lays the names out there with pr..."
links.text: He lays the names out there with pride and precision, like cards on a table. Right when he's getting distracted, there's a malevolent hiss behind the fence...

links.title: You: ""Got it -- I had another question.""
links.text: "Got it -- I had another question."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""How do you know that? You can't se..."
dialogueTree.text: "How do you know that? You can't see inside my head." (Whisper) "Can you read my mind, Cuno?"

links.title: Cuno: ""I can." His voice is so silent, it..."
links.text: "I can." His voice is so silent, it seems the words are echoing in your head, not coming from his lips. "Cuno can smell that violence shit. I know what you were thinking..."

links.title: Cuno: ""'I'm gonna fuck that Cuno up. I'm..."
links.text: "'I'm gonna fuck that Cuno up. I'm gonna shut his shit down...' You know what? You should have hit the Cuno, because NOW..." He raises his voice again.

links.title: Cuno: ""You're NOTHING! You're a joke to C..."
links.text: "You're NOTHING! You're a joke to Cuno. Cuno LAUGHS at you!" He spreads his arms, taking dominion over the yard. "KING CUNO!"

links.title: Authority: "Backing up was a bad idea, now he t..."
links.text: Backing up was a bad idea, now he thinks he's established dominance over you.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Cuno turned you into his prison bi..."
links.text: "Cuno turned you into his prison bitch! You're gonna be *in* this shit with Cuno..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No." The lieutenant almost rolls h..."
links.text: "No." The lieutenant almost rolls his eyes. "You're not. We can just leave..."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Bitch, you're gonna be in this shi..."
links.text: "Bitch, you're gonna be in this shit with Cuno *forever*!" The pipo-headed critter doesn't let him finish.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A pipo is a type of hat by the way."
links.text: A pipo is a type of hat by the way.

links.title: You: ""Nice pipo.""
links.text: "Nice pipo."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You don't talk to me about my fuck..."
links.text: "You don't talk to me about my fucking pipo! You don't know where I come from. You're just Cuno's bottom bitch."

links.title: You: ""Whatever. I had some questions abo..."
links.text: "Whatever. I had some questions about the crime scene."

links.title: Cuno: ""Okay, Cuno is kind to his bitch. A..."
links.text: "Okay, Cuno is kind to his bitch. Ask your questions, but remember." He taps at his temporal lobe. "This *changes* shit."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""*Click*, *click*, *click*, *click*..."
links.text: "*Click*, *click*, *click*, *click*" goes the little pipo-wearing asshole behind the fence.

links.title: Interfacing: "Meaning, there's been a change in s..."
links.text: Meaning, there's been a change in some kind of evil clockwork. There will be *consequences*.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Authority: "The whole charade was about establi..."
links.text: The whole charade was about establishing dominance over you. You backing up means he's succeeded.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Have you come to make your offerin..."
dialogueTree.text: "Have you come to make your offering to Cuno?"

links.title: You: ""Here's a drink, kid. It's alcohol...."
links.text: "Here's a drink, kid. It's alcohol. This should make us friends." (Extend the bottle of liquor.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Stay the fuck away from Cuno! You..."
links.text: "Stay the fuck away from Cuno! You smell like bum shit!" He backs away from you, wrinkling his nose. "Cuno's not a bum. Cuno doesn't touch that shit."

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Cuno: ""What, do you think Cuno's fucking..."
links.text: "What, do you think Cuno's fucking *eighty years old*? Tryin'a bring me bum juice... make the Cuno paranoid!"

links.title: You: ""You don't like alcohol?""
links.text: "You don't like alcohol?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Just because you get high off that..."
links.text: "Just because you get high off that shit doesn't mean Cuno has to fuck himself with that fermented," -- he points at the bottle -- "piss and shit mix."

links.title: You: ""Okay then.""
links.text: "Okay then."

links.title: Cuno: ""Tryin'a get a get a twelve year ol..."
links.text: "Tryin'a get a get a twelve year old hooked on the shit-shake..." He looks like he can't believe your depravity.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh..." the lieutenant mumbles opt..."
links.text: "Hmh..." the lieutenant mumbles optimistically. "Alcohol use *has* been declining in the under 16 bracket this past decade..."

links.title: Empathy: "This pleases him."
links.text: This pleases him.

links.title: You: ""Check out this bizarre drug I foun..."
links.text: "Check out this bizarre drug I found." (Show him the pyrholidon.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, you don't." He stops you. "No..."
links.text: "No, you don't." He stops you. "No one is *checking out* anything. Put that away."

links.title: Cuno: ""Bitches slapping each other, fight..."
links.text: "Bitches slapping each other, fighting for Cuno's attention. Cuno likes this pole dancing shit -- but it's not good enough." He crosses his hands.

links.title: Cuno: ""Not this *dreamer* shit again..."..."
links.text: "Not this *dreamer* shit again..." Cuno slaps his face. "Why do Cuno's bitches always try and bring Cuno that lame sha-la-la-la-bang shit? Cuno's not a fucking witch doctor!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""It was only once..." The little ra..."
links.text: "It was only once..." The little rat isn't having it. "And you fucking asked me to nick it, *Kuuno*!"

links.title: Cuno: ""No, I didn't..." The adolescent is..."
links.text: "No, I didn't..." The adolescent is momentarily disoriented. "It's fucking *Cuno*. Say it right, bitch, say it like it's said."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Kuuno. That's an Oranjese name."
links.text: Kuuno. That's an Oranjese name.

links.title: Cuno: ""Anyway." He mentally props himself..."
links.text: "Anyway." He mentally props himself back up. "Cuno doesn't do that radioactive shit. Makes Cuno's dick fall off. Cuno's got a huge dick."

links.title: Conceptualization: "A pretty *lame* oranjese name. Nowh..."
links.text: A pretty *lame* oranjese name. Nowhere near *Cuno*... The thought crosses your mind and then it's gone. Perhaps something for later?

links.title: You: ""Perhaps I could interest you in so..."
links.text: "Perhaps I could interest you in some speed?" (Show him the stuff.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Put that away. Right now." He stop..."
links.text: "Put that away. Right now." He stops you.

links.title: Suggestion: "The lieutenant's opinion of you has..."
links.text: The lieutenant's opinion of you has *definitely* lowered.

links.title: Cuno: ""What a fucking pooper..." Cuno poi..."
links.text: "What a fucking pooper..." Cuno points at his heart. "Bitch doesn't have the pump for it. Old bitch, pump's bust. Cuno has the pump for it. Cuno has a giant pump."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Don't ruin it for Cuno. Can't you s..."
links.text: Don't ruin it for Cuno. Can't you see Cuno's pump can still take it? Can still pump the good.

links.title: Rhetoric: "What the *fuck* are you talking abo..."
links.text: What the *fuck* are you talking about? Those are barely words. Anyway... this didn't work.

links.title: Cuno: ""Really? Shit... let Cuno sample it..."
links.text: "Really? Shit... let Cuno sample it then, pig." He almost starts grabbing for it, but then rebounds and runs his hand through his hair.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fucker! Cuno ain't buying that ent..."
links.text: "Fucker! Cuno ain't buying that entrapment shit. Takin' kilo from the pigs... what, you think Cuno's green shit?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You think Cuno's shit is green?" t..."
links.text: "You think Cuno's shit is green?" the little whatever-it-is behind the fence shrieks.

links.title: Cuno: ""You need to rethink your tribute t..."
links.text: "You need to rethink your tribute to Cuno. Cuno's not taking the cage just because you fucked yourself in the face!"

links.title: You: ""Got you a little set of wheels, Cu..."
links.text: "Got you a little set of wheels, Cuno." (Throw him the keys to the abandoned truck.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "With a quick motion the lieutenant..."
links.text: With a quick motion the lieutenant stops your hand before your palm opens. "Are you crazy?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Class-A fucker..." Cuno shakes his..."
links.text: "Class-A fucker..." Cuno shakes his head. "Blind fucks are always ruining it for everybody."

links.title: Authority: "Kim is never going to be okay with..."
links.text: Kim is never going to be okay with you handing something like this off to a minor. This plan is either off the table or you need to do it when he's not around.

links.title: Cuno: ""You fucking with Cuno?" The boy is..."
links.text: "You fucking with Cuno?" The boy is looking at the A6 logo on the key chain like he can't believe his eyes.

links.title: You: ""I don't know what got into me... G..."
links.text: "I don't know what got into me... Giving keys to a 20-ton motor-lorry to a child -- give 'em back!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Too late, pig! Thanks. I... fuckin..."
links.text: "Too late, pig! Thanks. I... fucking thanks!" For a moment he seems at a loss for words.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Don't trust the f****t oinker, Cun..."
links.text: "Don't trust the f****t oinker, Cuno!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Ease off, C!" He turns to you. "Th..."
links.text: "Ease off, C!" He turns to you. "Thanks, pig -- we're cool now. You punching yourself in the face worked out real good for everyone."

links.title: Interfacing: "He *really* likes this. This motor..."
links.text: He *really* likes this. This motor lorry shit makes Cuno happy. You could say you interfaced with his good side.

links.title: You: ""Believe it. I am the miracle worke..."
links.text: "Believe it. I am the miracle worker. The bedazzle-man. Around me, dreams come true."

links.title: Cuno: "The wide grin above his clenched ja..."
links.text: The wide grin above his clenched jaw agrees. His heavy breathing, his dilated pupils, it all speaks of one thing -- this was a really good idea!

links.title: You: ""Please be careful with it. And don..."
links.text: "Please be careful with it. And don't actually drive it anywhere, okay?"

links.title: Cuno: "The wide grin above his clenched ja..."
links.text: The wide grin above his clenched jaw, the heavy breathing, the dilated pupils... It all speaks of one thing -- this was a really good idea!

links.title: You: ""Let's rip some tar, Cuno." (Hold o..."
links.text: "Let's rip some tar, Cuno." (Hold out the pack of cigarettes.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Put it away." The lieutenant cross..."
links.text: "Put it away." The lieutenant crosses his arms. "The information here isn't worth it."

links.title: Cuno: ""Back off, fuck-eyes. Cuno is a man..."
links.text: "Back off, fuck-eyes. Cuno is a man." He puffs up his chest. "Cuno can smoke if he wants."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The lieutenant doesn't like this. I..."
links.text: The lieutenant doesn't like this. It may be less destructive to your working relationship to just come back alone later.

links.title: You: ""See, Kim? Cuno is a big boy.""
links.text: "See, Kim? Cuno is a big boy."

links.title: Cuno: ""*MAN!*" The screech from the red-h..."
links.text: "*MAN!*" The screech from the red-haired goblin is nearly deafening.

links.title: You: ""Okay, *man*. Cuno is a man and men..."
links.text: "Okay, *man*. Cuno is a man and men smoke. You want this?" (Shake the pack of cigarettes at the boy.)

links.title: You: ""I'm not indulging that.""
links.text: "I'm not indulging that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You don't need to. He doesn't know..."
links.text: "You don't need to. He doesn't know anything."

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh, Cuno knows. Cuno knows shit,"..."
links.text: "Oh, Cuno knows. Cuno knows shit," he squints at you. "Expensive shit. Mysterious shit. *Killer* shit."

links.title: Drama: "He does not know *killer* related s..."
links.text: He does not know *killer* related shit, sire. It's a falseness. He *may* know mysterious shit, however... it's hard to tell.

links.title: You: ""See? He could know something. So h..."
links.text: "See? He could know something. So how about it, Cuno?" (Shake the pack of cigarettes at the boy.)

links.title: You: ""We may need his help. Who knows wh..."
links.text: "We may need his help. Who knows what he knows?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No -- what we *need* is to get bac..."
links.text: "No -- what we *need* is to get back to work. He doesn't know anything."

links.title: You: ""This *is* work. So how about it, C..."
links.text: "This *is* work. So how about it, Cuno? This can be yours." (Shake the pack of cigarettes at the boy.)

links.title: You: ""You're right, I shouldn't give smo..."
links.text: "You're right, I shouldn't give smokes to a kid."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck you too, piggo! Fuck you and..."
links.text: "Fuck you too, piggo! Fuck you and your four eyed friend!" He shakes his head, disappointed. "Thought you wanted to make this right with Cuno..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Okay, porkson..." He snatches it f..."
links.text: "Okay, porkson..." He snatches it from your hand. "Tar keeps Cuno sharp, helps Cuno think. Cuno likes that brain-boost shit."

links.title: Cuno: ""We're cool now. But don't be pulli..."
links.text: "We're cool now. But don't be pulling this shit on Cuno, or Cuno's gonna have to beat the shit out of you, *again*."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Historical revisionism has taken pl..."
links.text: Historical revisionism has taken place.

links.title: Cuno: ""Okay, porkson..." He snatches it f..."
links.text: "Okay, porkson..." He snatches it from your hand. "Tar keeps Cuno sharp, helps Cuno think. Cuno likes that brain-boost shit."

links.title: You: ""This is probably too lame for you,..."
links.text: "This is probably too lame for you, Cuno, but maybe you know someone..." (Hold out the *Hjelmdallerman* book.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Uh... Cuno doesn't fucking read!"..."
links.text: "Uh... Cuno doesn't fucking read!" He quickly glances at the fence. "Fucking book shit, fucks with your mind..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows this four-eyed fuck, to..."
links.text: "Cuno knows this four-eyed fuck, totally hooked on the book, can't get enough of this shit. Fucking sad really... Cuno could make mad money off him, exploit his disease."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Who are you talking about, Cuno?""
links.text: "Who are you talking about, Cuno?"

links.title: Cuno: ""A guy Cuno knows!" He shouts at th..."
links.text: "A guy Cuno knows!" He shouts at the fence. "Martin. From out of town. From Graad or some shit."

links.title: Drama: "This boy of twelve does not know an..."
links.text: This boy of twelve does not know anyone from Graad, sire. We suspect the boy himself might be this mystery 'Martin'.

links.title: You: ""You don't know anyone from Graad...."
links.text: "You don't know anyone from Graad. You want it for yourself, don't you?"

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck do you know what Cuno wan..."
links.text: "The fuck do you know what Cuno wants or knows, huh?" The kid lashes out at you. "Shove that book-hook in your fat ass and find something worthy to bring to the Cuno!"

links.title: You: ""So you want the book?""
links.text: "So you want the book?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Fine... Cuno's gonna take it off y..."
links.text: "Fine... Cuno's gonna take it off your fat ass. At least he's gonna make some paper off this shit..." He eagerly pockets the book. "Now, what do you want?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Fine... Cuno's gonna take it off y..."
links.text: "Fine... Cuno's gonna take it off your fat ass. At least he's gonna make some paper off this shit..." He eagerly pockets the book. "Now, what do you want?"

links.title: You: ""Actually I wanna keep the book.""
links.text: "Actually I wanna keep the book."

links.title: Cuno: ""Shove that shit in your fat ass an..."
links.text: "Shove that shit in your fat ass and stop wasting Cuno's time if you ain't got anything to offer to the Cuno."

links.title: Empathy: "He's disappointed by your change of..."
links.text: He's disappointed by your change of heart.

links.title: You: ""I don't have anything... What can..."
links.text: "I don't have anything... What can I offer you, Cuno?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please don't waste time on nonsens..."
links.text: "Please don't waste time on nonsense."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The lieutenant does not approve of..."
links.text: The lieutenant does not approve of this. At all.

links.title: Cuno: ""Don't listen to the blind fuck, pi..."
links.text: "Don't listen to the blind fuck, piggo, you're doing the right thing here, trying to get Cuno to like you again." He pauses to think.

links.title: Cuno: ""You can pay tribute to Cuno with d..."
links.text: "You can pay tribute to Cuno with drugs. Or cigarettes... or some wheels. Cuno could use some wheels. Motorized carriage shit."

links.title: Cuno: ""You can pay tribute to Cuno with d..."
links.text: "You can pay tribute to Cuno with drugs or cigarettes..." He pauses. "Gets Cuno to like you again... Some giant-ass wheels would be nice too."

links.title: You: ""Whatever then.""
links.text: "Whatever then."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What are you doing?" The lieutenan..."
links.text: "What are you doing?" The lieutenant's dark eyes peer into yours over his spectacles.

links.title: You: ""I need to make truce with Cuno, of..."
links.text: "I need to make truce with Cuno, offer him something."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, you really, really don't. That..."
links.text: "No, you really, really don't. That is a twelve year old boy. His opinion of you doesn't matter."

links.title: Cuno: ""You don't fucking matter, book-gim..."
links.text: "You don't fucking matter, book-gimp!"

links.title: You: ""I'm still going to mark it down as..."
links.text: "I'm still going to mark it down as something I need to do..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But... but... *why*?" He looks tru..."
links.text: "But... but... *why*?" He looks truly puzzled. "You're turning this into a huge thing."

links.title: You: ""In punching, someone always ends u..."
links.text: "In punching, someone always ends up being someone's bitch. Don't you know anything about male power structures, Kim?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're totally unraveling, officer.""
links.text: "You're totally unraveling, officer."

links.title: You: ""Don't worry, lieutenant -- I got t..."
links.text: "Don't worry, lieutenant -- I got this. Now, let's go." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""All will be well as soon as I get..."
links.text: "All will be well as soon as I get this 'being Cuno's bitch' situation off my back." (Don't wait for the lieutenant to answer.) "Let's get to work, Kim!" [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""It's just very hard for me to let..."
links.text: "It's just very hard for me to let things go. I know it doesn't matter, but I need to make this right."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uh... okay..." The lieutenant look..."
links.text: "Uh... okay..." The lieutenant looks worried. "If you absolutely *need* to." He shakes his head. "But right now let's move out."

links.title: You: "Say nothing. [Leave.]"
links.text: Say nothing. [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uh... okay..." The lieutenant look..."
links.text: "Uh... okay..." The lieutenant looks worried. "I *might* understand if you told me, but, sure... let's not waste any more time here." He turns to leave.

links.title: You: ""You're right, Kim, you're right, o..."
links.text: "You're right, Kim, you're right, of course." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's eyes inspect your..."
links.text: The lieutenant's eyes inspect your face for a while, then his posture relaxes. "Okay, let's go."

links.title: You: ""Nothing, lieutenant. I don't want..."
links.text: "Nothing, lieutenant. I don't want to get into this." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Cunoesse: ""Punch yourself in the face again!"..."
dialogueTree.text: "Punch yourself in the face again!" The other one won't even let you talk to Cuno.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""KILL YOURSELF!!! Cuno, make him ki..."
links.text: "KILL YOURSELF!!! Cuno, make him kill himself!"

links.title: You: ""Look, you're on my crime scene. I..."
links.text: "Look, you're on my crime scene. I can't have uncooperative civilians here."

links.title: Cuno: ""Whoah-whoah!" The boy hovers in yo..."
links.text: "Whoah-whoah!" The boy hovers in your face. "What's this psycho shit? You gonna pretend like nothing happened?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""He's tryin'a forget it Cuno. Don't..."
links.text: "He's tryin'a forget it Cuno. Don't let him forget it just like that."

links.title: Cuno: ""Reminisce with Cuno: first you try..."
links.text: "Reminisce with Cuno: first you try to fiddle this -- then you punch yourself in the face? What was up with that?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Yeah, Cuno!" The sycophantic pipo-..."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno!" The sycophantic pipo-wearing pup behind the fence agrees. "What *was* that?"

links.title: Cuno: ""How are you gonna make Cuno forget..."
links.text: "How are you gonna make Cuno forget that shit, huh?"

links.title: You: ""Look..." (Play along.) "I want to..."
links.text: "Look..." (Play along.) "I want to make this right with Cuno. Make amends."

links.title: Cuno: ""Ame-fucking-what, pig?""
links.text: "Ame-fucking-what, pig?"

links.title: You: ""Amends, Cuno. I was wrong to try t..."
links.text: "Amends, Cuno. I was wrong to try to hit you. I'm sorry."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah? How are you going to make it..."
links.text: "Yeah? How are you going to make it up to Cuno, pigshit?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "A material offering is implied. He..."
links.text: A material offering is implied. He wants *stuff*. Only stuff can make it okay again.

links.title: You: ""You're a cool dude. Let's just bur..."
links.text: "You're a cool dude. Let's just bury the hatchet, okay?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cool what? What the fuck is wrong..."
links.text: "Cool what? What the fuck is wrong with you?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""I think you broke his brain when y..."
links.text: "I think you broke his brain when you fucked him up, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""You better come up with a way to m..."
links.text: "You better come up with a way to make Cuno forget you tried to fucking hit him, piggo."

links.title: You: ""It may not look like it now, but y..."
links.text: "It may not look like it now, but you may have vital information."

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh, so that's what this is about...."
links.text: "Oh, so that's what this is about. You need a snitch-bitch. You need Cuno --" he pauses for clarity " -- to be your sweaty little snitch bitch."

links.title: Cuno: ""You lost your shit in the booth, t..."
links.text: "You lost your shit in the booth, tried to beat a confession out of Cuno... and pissed yourself?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""That's right, Cuno. You're right."..."
links.text: "That's right, Cuno. You're right." The sycophantic pipo-wearing pup behind the fence agrees.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I don't have the time for th..."
links.text: "Yeah, I don't have the time for this." [Leave.]

links.title: Cuno: ""That's right. Just fuck off.""
links.text: "That's right. Just fuck off."

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Look, C, it's the fucking war-pig!..."
dialogueTree.text: "Look, C, it's the fucking war-pig! Try not to knock yourself out, f****t!"

links.title: You: ""I've come to ask questions -- I st..."
links.text: "I've come to ask questions -- I still have a case to solve."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You belittled yourself before the..."
links.text: "You belittled yourself before the Cuno." Her voice is calm, she doesn't dignify you with a look. "Now you must seek his forgiveness."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
